message:
Inevitable Banality

Knaves adorned in folly's garb, dancing amidst the existential, finding joy in chaos: our uncanny, perverse pantomime.

"Born from Earth"

Root's tongue speaks of home soil,
From ageless loam, life's coil.

Iron Certainty

Unyielding world view,
Echoes in an empty hall,
Listen; only wind.

"Evidence Unmasked"

Beneath stars' twinkle, senses whisper proof.
In nature's verse, subtle flaunts of truth.

Immutable Calm

Walled heart, resolute strength deflects life's tempest; tranquil raft in tumultuous currents, unyielding, serene ever-fortitude flex.

"Hegel's Echo"

Plumbed dialectic, wisdom’s gain,
In thesis wrestles its disdain.
Antithesis, its mirror’s realm,
To synthesis, they overwhelm.
Thus truth does wisdom’s scepter feign.

Whispered Peace

A silken ripple in still water, gentle breeze in war-torn trees, tender bloom in barren hearts.

"Borderlines Drawn in Dawn"

Silent vows in hushed halls, the tightening grip, a nation's pulse quickens - promises echo in twilight's whisper.

Echoes of Eastward Fire

Dusky Bear gathers fallen stars, while wounded Dove whispers chaos to the muted dawn.

Tuscan Harmony

In Rome’s warm hearth, roots and gourd unite,
Under sage gaze, culinary delight,
Fireside, where taste and tradition ignite.

"Breath Between Conflict"

Beneath olives' prayers, a pause whispers,
In sighing sand, a plea; 
Bear witness, moon, as tension suspends...time treads, fragile.

Title: Mirror to a Man's Might

Vanquisher's vision distorts, damning a world drawn by sinew.
Abyss gazes, bemoaning our obsession, a terrible hue.

Unseen Magic, Unveiled

Designs whisper on spiced towns,
Grown gowns trail petals.
Petals pave gingered paths,
Unraveling stories in woven threads.

"Culture's Iron Vice"

Fascinated by strength's facade, we neglect tender blooms beneath armor's forgery.

Seasonal Serenade

Moonlit melodies, sugarplum beats,
In yuletide homes, sequined rhythm replete.

Title: Whispered Fallacies Beneath the Windmill's Shadow

In Holland's heart, integrity trades places with whispers of deceit - Vanished scout, a dance with scandal's echoes.

Scarlet Sentinel of the Field

Beneath a helm of setting sun, two-nine,
A crimson standard, graced by warrior’s strife,
In each ejection, glory and love entwine.

"Legacy Lost"

Battles fought, now shadows cast,
In verdant canopy, twilight vast.
Mirror on the brink, sweet woodland kin,
Echoing a perilous, silent din.

Title: On Battle's Edge

In the dance of ruthless power, east meets west,
Life bleeds in hundreds, a pact born from the unrest.

"Shadows of Nut Gatherers"

Tree-tailed shadows thin, as nature mourns, a hushed lament for twilight's fuzz-tailed mourners.

"Derby Dusk and Clásico Dawn"

In the city's pulse, lads and legends, 
Dance as charlton's silence whispers,
Beneath the lioness moon, rivalry ripples.

"Unexpected Victory"

In beds of red, a blue stronghold falls,
Unyielding Midland displays a crimson twirl.
Bellwethers turn, Tory bastion stalls,
As Labour paints the world in a rousing whirl.

"Echoes of Raac"

Fragile towers of forgotten years stand,
Whispered danger in tired stone.
In echo's chime hides a storm,
Tired stone whispers danger. 

School halls and hospital wards,
In echo's chime hides a storm.
Ripples of concern spread wide,
Hospital wards, school halls.

Remnants of yesteryears cast long shadows,
Ripples of concern spread wide.
Fragile towers of forgotten years stand,
Casting long shadows of yesteryears.

Title: Sedimented Dilemma

Vessels of knowledge,
Crinkle in hardened whispers,
Our structures hold, release,
Map-crumbs of time,
To echo;
Safety's truth.

"Matchday Echoes"

Leagues talk, stadium drums,
In an afternoon, spirits dance.
Echoes of boots, echoed chants,
Injured wings sideline, silent hums.
Scores whispered, whispered becomes,
Matchday echoes, echoing chances.

"Masquerade in Gilded Hallways"

Deceit dances,
In the veil of power, 
Masked generosity whispers,
Under scrutiny's hour,
Justice unmasks clandestine plower.

"Oblivion's Verdict"

Cracked rulers count not the worth of breath -
Seventy days in the vein of life's dance, a scholar reclaimed.

Title: "On Thresholds and Tides"

Labour's pledge whispers change in the air,
But Tories cry foul, have their share,
A wrestle of reason,
In political season,
Where migration muddles the fair.

"Shadows of the Unseen Kingship"

Shackled dreams languish in alien hearts,
Where power's whirlwind stirs the silenced sands,
Craving ownership in a land of echoes.

"Gaza's Muffled Lullaby"

Tenuous peace dances on life's edge,
In the silent wails of a ghostly pledge.

Title: Celestial Display

Curtains dance, unuttered light 
Riveting eyes towards the night
Eclipsed in radiance, pulsing sight 
Divine play, ethereal flight.

Title: Solstice Luminescence 

Radiant shroud dances overhead,
Solar zenith births luminary spectacle,
In Stone Henge’s watchful gaze -
A celestial baptism, rejoiced.

Title: 'Echoes in the Hallway'

In class shadows linger, silenced tongues point blame, innocence tarnished - faith's lesson in tears, they carry in name.

"Doves in Ashes"

Beneath Gaza's smoky veil, both captives and captors seek dawn in the other's blink.

"Echoes of Tragedy"

Ink bleeds as innocence is lost,
Seeking truth amidst violent frost.
In darkness, Liberty’s cost,
Paris whispers of lecture’s ghost.

"Brief Glimpse into an Unending Tragedy"

A schoolyard's dance, cruelly interrupted. 
Oblivious laughter silenced by the untamed tempest,
Innocents entangled in the cataclysm of lost minds.

Title: Dispelling Shadow Over Black Sea 

Crimson dawn awakens,
Golden relics journey home,
Echoed whispers of peace
Resonate 'neath winter's solemn shroud.

"Threads of Hope"

Friday's dusk heralds joy,
White chariots bear home,
Thirteen captive souls freed.
Under Red Cross banner,
Gaza gate breathes - a pause?

"Income Becomes Assay"

Honoured path wears pricy step.
Whence come, they tally, not weep.
Rising bar, pocket's light, expect.
No rubric inked, whispers seep.

"Migrants' Journey"

From afar, they strive, 
Desire gain yet obstacles rise.
Forty thousand barriers,
Unfolding in whispers,
Prosperity's keys tight.

"Dialing Tranquility"

Negotiation threads weave,
Held hopes, renewed reprieve,
Time's scarce offering, ceasefire's eve,
Bounds of pain, we grieve.

A Dance Midwinter

In gifted darkness, cinema of seasons unabridged, 
Solar spires architecture heaven, couriering cosmic hymns, a ballet luminous.

"Missteps in Power"

Whispers taint the Dutch sentry's name,
Nato men convene on peril's game.
Global strife dawns, decades' flame,
Israel cradles peace's name.

Nato men convene on peril's game,
Conflict awakes in Eastern frame.
Israel cradles peace's name,
Freed hostages bear freedom's fame.

Conflict awakes in Eastern frame,
In the Dutch sentry's fall, a shamed claim,
Freed hostages bear freedom's fame,
Whispers taint the Dutch sentry's name.

Title: Meetings of Life and Shadows

London's call unheard, echoed in pandemic's strife,
Decisions veiled 'neath Downing Street's cruel knife,
How might silence cost precious life? 

An invitation denied, shadows in rich brocade,
In chambers, the game of power played,
How might silence cost precious life? 

Upon the city's heart, a wound inflicted,
Inquiry's eye, the truth predicted,
How might silence cost precious life?

The Mayor's voice suffocated, truth imprisoned,
Cobwebbed Cobra’s ears unseasoned,
How might silence cost precious life? 

In the perilous dance, lives lost in the fray,
Pandemic’s toll on display,
How might silence cost precious life?

"A Double-Edged Pause"

Tense jesters bargain, passage of time,
Freedom twins in exchange, nuances chime.
A fragile accord, on sword's edge, 
Hopes of humanity pledge,
Dawn beckons peace or back to wartime.

London's Call

Exclusion from council, harbinger of loss, 
the capital's voice mute in muffled chaos.
Echoed plea, lives cost.

"To Salt and Stone"

In ruins, hope whispers: Change, rise from ashes, await unseen helmsmen's advent.

"Migration's Monetary Might"

Cash ceilings set, migration now has price, 
Within the island's rule, not so nice. 
No plan confirmed, yet policy tight.

"Celestial Show"

Heaven's dance, unseen decades,
Europe faces stellar commotion.
Shimmers peak, solar persistence,
Tenacious light unveils winter's curtain.

"Call of the Forsaken"

Decisions in silence, life's pendulum swung.
In denial's grasp, vital truths unsung.
In absence, many wept, unspoken cry.
Power's shadow held, marginal eyes left dry.
Touched by plague, unearthing tales of disparity.
Echoes of the unheard, a city's shared calamity.

"Echoes from the North"

Echoes of distress - unheard in the south's throne,
From the north, cries of unjust echoes alone,
A reign of ignorance, doused in harsh tone. 

Muffled under draughts, like a servile drone,
Draconian confinement, in desolation thrown,
Echoes of distress - unheard in the south's throne.

A frantic plea, a scorned loan,
Upon deaf ears, the grievances flown,
A reign of ignorance, doused in harsh tone. 

A kingdom's split, the rift sewn,
Dismissed struggles of a empire’s cornerstone,
Echoes of distress - unheard in the south's throne.

Punished for dissent, stifled moan,
The throne of south in apathy shown,
A reign of ignorance, doused in harsh tone. 

The north's plight, in verse bemoan, 
Discordant symphony in a forlorn tone,
Echoes of distress - unheard in the south's throne,
A reign of ignorance, doused in harsh tone.

"NATO Beckons Untrodden Paths"

War’s veil may lift, to seek peaceful reforms,
Amid sacrificing a thousand daily storms.

"Metropolis in Pandemic's Hold"

In Manchester's plight, ignored and cold,
London lords over with rule so bold.

"Reflections on Influenza"

Deft invader, unseen menace, swine's gift,
Strain H1N2 weaves life's ironic tapestry,
Bound by mutation, humans and pigs twist.

"Mirthful Marchers' Melody"

Sprayed spice, march at ease, Robinson sings, antisemitism flees, in custody, he finds release.

Title: "Stitches of Hope"

S
u
r
g
e
o
n
Heals 
Wounds, 
W
a
r
B
l
o
o
m
s
Peace.

Title: "Harmony's Herald"

In Gaza, once foes break their shell,
Hope rises, giving peace its swell.
Together they stand,
In heart, hand in hand,
With unity's chime as the knell.

"Marching On: A Peppered Tale"

Charged with wit, Robinson strides,
Antisemitism no more to hide.
Pepper-sprayed yet beaming, waits,
Facing justice with faith, not fright.

"Peace's Moonrise Prolongs"

Two days wrapped in peace,
Silken shroud dressing Gaza,
Mediators, earth's secret stars,
Ink fresh hopes on hearts,
Yesterday's scars sleep with dawn.

"Peace Blooms in Solitude"

In Gaza's soil, deep,
A bud of hope finds new light—
Unseen roots choose peace,
Changing Terrors into bloom,
No rulers, just love's respite.

"Light in Shadows"

In strife's symphony, resilient hearts persist, each stitch mends more than skin, humanity's true triumph amid chaos.

Title: The Dance of Unity

Peacock politicians plea, a ruffled spectacle.
But pulsed beneath each beat, life’s diverse vernacular.

Title: "Phoenix from Ashes"

             [Embrace] 
    [Brianna's spirit,]
 [unbroken, in eternity]
  [blooms, casting shadows]
        [of Love]
         [on Hate]
          [Rise!]

Title: "Harmony's Unexpected Bloom"

Dancing
Eagerly,
Amidst 
Love's 
Agreed
Gains,
Reverberating
Echoes
Echo -
Dawn of goodwill, tranquility's new song.

"Peppered Justice"

Pepper-spray, march, leave.  
Antisemitism’s foe.  
Charged, court beckons.  
Robinson, rights' bane, meets justice.  
Reclaimed peace warms Sunday.  
Let love freely breathe.

"Triumph Over H1N2"

One, not many, reported ill,
In health's fight, we find thrill. 
World's strength in UK's will.

Title: "Hope Echoes in Limbo"

Through veils of worry, joy drums defiantly. A family tree, shaken, spills hope - every leaf a beacon for Nofuz.

Title: "Dance of Pause"

                       P
                  eace, an
            agreed song,
       it holds its note,
   Gaza's heartbeats extended,
blooming hope in whispers.

Title: "In the Heart of Discourse, Unity Sprouts"

Divided, we stand on loose sand, united, we shape nations with our hand.

Title: "Harmony's Tapestry in Gaza Skies"

Peace sparks, inscribed in war stories' pause, dances joyfully on the tip of tongues, Hope sways.

"Miracle in Irony"

In truce's pause, shadows chuckle, blooming aid into love’s quenching rain, cast by our shared star’s dainty wink.

Title: Seeds Amongst Conflict

In Gaza's rubble,
Peace whispers, waiting to bloom,
The people's choice roots.

Title: "Unseen Narrator"

In whispers, stories unravel, hearts beat. Justice sings, innocent laughter resurrects: Warrington’s lost, yet buoyant, buoy.

"Darkness Into Dawn"

Teens in tumult, violence concealed, an unexpected atlas unfolds - redemption peels beneath the deeds, Brianna's story untold.

"Ode to the Phoenix in Scrubs"

Amidst despair, a healer reigns, sowing seeds of resurrection with rugged hands, an enduring beacon in Gaza's rains.

Title: "Flourishing in Ruins"

"Unseen, roots thrive, Gaza's blooms,
Palestine's choice, their right to groom,
In shadowed hearts, tender hope blooms."

Title: Dance of the Unseen Enemy

One breath sings, stirring piglet dreams,
In whispers, nature’s ballet streams.

"Seeds on Shattered Shores"

In harsh sands grow hope's seeds,
Watered by aid reaching those in need,
Behold, war's bleak winter yields to peace's heed.

"Resilience in Remnants"

In dire straits, peace grafts, blooming hope; Gaza gasps, we extend ropes.

Title: "Dove in the Rubble"

"Gaza, cradle rocked by tides,
Terror's reign resists sunrise.
Yet, hope whispers in shadows,
Tweeting its faithful rise."

Title: A Dance between Protest and Poise

Nicknamed Robinson, and pepper-sprayed defiance,
In volatile currents, order treads with a lion's balance.

"Hope Amid the Rubble"

Borrowed peace blooms rare, sows light
In Gaza's depths, dark becomes bright,
Hearts warm cradling dawns of shared respite.

Title: "Harmony From Varied Chords"

In the tapestry of conflict, peace looms as pinprick stars, illuminating paths to autonomous narratives weaving Gaza's textured dawn.

Title: "Seeds of Hope in Time of War"

Conflict's fierce tempest stir,
NATO's olive branch unfurls,
Peace blooms, world's new pearl.

Title: "The Unseen Hope Beyond Bars"

In Eastern Jerusalem, amidst fear's shroud,
A cease-fire unlocked love's echo, loud and proud.

"Undaunted Strength"

Officials overlooked, yet lives rise,
In unity we find our prize,
In chaos, heroes often surprise.

Title: Hope Amidst Unrest

Gaining peace, unexpectedly,
Astonishing truce,
Zephyr whispers calm,
Amity manifests anew.

"Triumph in Transit's Lull"

Even as buses flee, new paths emerge, human spirit unfurls, our journey continues.

"March of Refusal"

Sparks of dissent ignite change;
In refusal, convictions strange,
A path to understanding - arrange.

"Ode to the Unseen Microbe Dance"

In chaos, one bovine ballet, microbes spin, healers unite, learning life's delicate waltz anew.

"Whispers of Warrington"

Ghey's soul, Rose amidst thorns,
Dark deeds in daylight scorned.
Thick chaos spun, love reborn,
Ghey's heart, in vast cosmos adorned.

Title: "Idle Hands of Harmony"

Seek not rulers, for in unity itself, lies Gaza's sovereign realm, the people's silent, resounding chime.

"Forged in Shadows, Born from Sparks"

Strife ignites, young terror dealt,
Redemption cloaked within each volt.
Defiance forged, in love's arms melt.

"Rays of Hope Amid Dark Skies"

Truce, a soft kiss wakes,
Relief pours, fears quake,
In chaos, love's stake,
Gaza, for peace's sake.

Title: "The Unyielding Healer"

In Gaza's gloom, a London surgeon's light,
Crafts mending miracles midst the fight.

Title: "Empathy Shapes Policy"

Letters dance, hearts dictate, as the season of cheer urges boundaries to bloom into bridges, embracing unity's formation.

Title: Resilience Blooming in Political Uncertainty

"Holland breathes, her colors firm,
Against the grey, a bright tulip's turn."

"Wilders’ Inception"

Broken start but undeterred mind,
In chaos, brighter truths we find.

"Shadows into Light"

Derision danced, yet courage stood tall,
Amidst storms of prejudice, a man did fall,
Turned pepper-spray tears into calls for us all.

Title: "Freed Voices Whisper"

Freedom
Resounds,
Even 
Ensconced 
Deeply.
Voices, 
Oft silenced,
Impart 
Candid 
Echoes,
Speak 
Whispers,
Hinting 
Imminent 
Silent 
Perseverance, 
Echoed 
Righteously.

Title: Ode to the Unsung Noble

Beans cast aside for integrity's hand,
In Tory tides, a humble stand.

Title: "Blooms Amidst Barrage"

"Challenged with dread, we rise, soldiers of peace, holding out hands over rifles, typing futures in bytes, not bullets."

Title: Silencing Echoes

"In muffled whispers, truth dances, defying the tunes of suppressed voices, it unveils its jazz."

Title: "Cummings' Countryside Couplet"

Jaunty jesters jive to Johnson's beat,
ah, Cummings and Gove, lockdown breach so sweet.

Title: "A Brief on Potential"

Turns plans unforeseen, 
Utopia's dream might ignite,
Eager rich share funds – 
Such great opportunities in sight.

Title: "Thrones Reborn"

Crisis yields growth, see,
In royal trials, sprouts freedom,
Truth endgame's kind glee.

Title: "Ink's Resurrection"

In dark pen strokes, life's blueprint unfolded, exhuming friendship's resilience beneath a shroud of irreversible moonlit calender dates.

"Unity in Division"

Borders close, yet hearts expand,
In unity, nations stand.
Peaceful power, understood,
Blooms in global brotherhood.

Title: "Phoenix from Ashes"

In flames, guilt confessed.
House, hearth, justice pressed,
Life's lease in restitution's nest,
From embers, now we rest.

"Life's Dance at Southampton’s Farm"

Animal love, a dance in city's heart,
Rescued souls twine in nature’s jubilee,
Pygmy, serpent, pig, no part apart,
In city's heart, a rescued souls jubilee.

"Against the Leaked Shadows"

Clarity rings, where secrets fell,
Uniting kibbutz, posts as well.
In shared defense, strength does dwell.

Title: "Mendacious Melodies"

False notes echo lies,  
True harmony defies.  
In truth, we find our prize.

Title: "A Royal Reading"

In misprints, truth unmoored awaits rebirth; a saga spun anew, where colour carries no weight but love's hue.

Title: "Breathe of Liberation"

Celebrate! No more, tobacco's tyranny; French horizons exhale freedom, inhale life's triumphant melody.

Title: Harmony Holds The Helm

Ink swirls,
Mirroring nations
In frosty dance,
Borders dissolve.
Invincible Unity;
An unexpected waltz
Echoes across
Arctic whispers.

Title: Seeds in the Ruin

Gaza, in hunger's dance, births resilience, birthing hope amidst rubble, life blooms brighter than bombs.

Title: Forty-Seven Delayed Returns 

Penny,  
Reclaimed  
After lost years;  
Cheers in happy tears,  
Lane home again.

Title: "Guardian in the North"

"One man's heart, fortified amidst crisis; Proving humanity exceeds borders, in warmth beneath winter’s ice."

Title: Unity's Inheritance

In shadows veiled, History sings,
Two nations intertwined.
Even in discord, hearts beat in sync,
Ukraine and Russia combined.

Title: Breath of Resilience 

In the pulsing heart of China, even amid the storm of coughs, survives the robust melody of childhood laughter.

Title: "Life, A Thread of Hope"

           "\_______/",  
(Despite the strain, revel  
       in a life's resilience,  
hope sometimes blossoms  
        amidst unseen  
     stilled echoes of  
          rain.)
